You will inevitably run into problems while learning R. The best starting point for troubleshooting is Google and [Stackoverflow](https://stackoverflow.com/){target="_blank"}. In addition, these resources can also be helpful:

**Programming in R**:

- Grolemund, Garrett. "Hands-On Programming with R"
[[free online](https://rstudio-education.github.io/hopr/){target="_blank"}],
[[buy on amazon](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1449359019/){target="_blank"}]
- Peng, Roger D. "R Programming for Data Science"
[[online - pay what you want](https://leanpub.com/rprogramming){target="_blank"}]

**Data Analysis in R**:

- Wickham, Hadley. "R for Data Science"
[[free online](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/){target="_blank"}],
[[buy on amazon](https://www.amazon.com/Data-Science-Transform-Visualize-Model/dp/1491910399){target="_blank"}]
- Peng, Roger D. "Exploratory Data Analysis with R"
[[online - pay what you want](https://leanpub.com/exdata){target="_blank"}]

**Data Visualization**:

- Healy, Kieran. "Data Visualization: A practical introduction"
[[free online](http://socviz.co/){target="_blank"}],
[[buy on amazon](https://www.amazon.com/Data-Visualization-Introduction-Kieran-Healy/dp/0691181624){target="_blank"}]
- Wilke, Claus O. "Fundamentals of Data Visualization"
[[free online](https://serialmentor.com/dataviz/){target="_blank"}],
[[buy on amazon](https://www.amazon.com/Fundamentals-Data-Visualization-Informative-Compelling/dp/1492031089){target="_blank"}]


**RStudio Cheatsheets**:

- [All cheatsheets](https://www.rstudio.com/resources/cheatsheets/){target="_blank"}
- [Data wrangling with the `dplyr` library](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/data-transformation.pdf){target="_blank"}
- [Data visualization with the `ggplot2` library](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/data-visualization-2.1.pdf){target="_blank"}
- [RMarkdown](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/rmarkdown-2.0.pdf){target="_blank"}

**RMarkdown**:

- [60 second markdown guide](https://commonmark.org/help/){target="_blank"}
- [10 minute markdown tutorial](https://commonmark.org/help/tutorial/){target="_blank"}
- [Markdown It](https://markdown-it.github.io){target="_blank"}: Quickly demo Markdown code.
- [Table generator](http://www.tablesgenerator.com/){target="_blank"}: Create tables and get export code for multiple formats.
- [CMU RMarkdown guide (detailed)](http://www.stat.cmu.edu/~cshalizi/rmarkdown/){target="_blank"}
